metadata.title: Configure Datadog metrics collection for Consul on Kubernetes
metadata.description: Consul can integrate with external platforms such as Datadog to stream metrics about its operations. Learn how to enable Consul monitoring with Datadog by configuring the `metrics.datadog` Helm value override options.

outlineItems.title: Configure Datadog metrics collection for Consul on Kubernetes

pageHeading.title: Configure Datadog metrics collection for Consul on Kubernetes

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.
